title: Assessment of smallholder rice farmers' adaptation strategies to climate change in Kebbi state, Nigeria
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Sodipe Solaja, Ayorinde Kolawole, Toluwalase Awe, Opeyemi Oriade, Wale Ayojimi, Ibukun Ojo, Gideon Nayan, Ruth Adedayo, Stephen Etta-Oyong, Faithfulness Olasehinde, Oluwatosin Asemokhai, Isibietmfon Nsikak
